title: NO O/L related lectures from today (17)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Department of Examinations says conducting tuition classes, seminars, lectures, and workshops related to the 2021 GCE Ordinary Level Examination will be prohibited from midnight on Tuesday (17) until the conclusion of the exam.
L.M.D. Dharmasena said if any person or institution disregards this order, they will be found guilty under the Examinations Act.
The G. C. E. Ordinary Level Examination will take place from the 23rd of May to the 1st of June.
Parliament split over the vote on Deputy Speaker; SLFP threatened to cast invalid votes
